participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, but struggles with motivation.
participant_1.background: My biggest animal sighting was a great white shark swimming beside our boat off the coast of South Africa. I am a vet tech. Photography is my passion, but I could never do it if I were blind because it requires a keen sense of sight to capture the perfect shot. I've been married for five years.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Reflective and family-oriented, with a love for storytelling.
participant_2.background: I write in my journal to clear my head. My favorite movie genre is horror. I miss my family terribly, but I am happy with my new life. I love to listen to the Avett Brothers while working on cases for the federal court. I have 2 sisters.

content.text: Hi there, what's your favorite movie genre?
Hi there! My favorite movie genre is horror! I love to be scared. How about you?
I used to like horror movies, but now I find them too scary. I'm more of a comedy person now.
I love comedies too! What are some of your favorites?
I love The Hangover movies and Bridesmaids. What about you?
I love The Hangover movies too! They're so funny. I also love The Office and Parks and Rec.
I've seen a few episodes of The Office, but I've never seen Parks and Rec. Are they similar?
They're both funny workplace comedies, but Parks and Rec is a little more wholesome. I think you'd like it.
I'll have to check it out! Do you watch any other TV shows?
I watch a lot of TV! I love Law & Order SVU, NCIS, and The Good Wife.
I love Law & Order SVU too! I've never seen NCIS or The Good Wife, but I've heard good things about them.
You should check them out! They're both really good.
I will! Thanks for the recommendations!
